item.title: EJ add a quote by W.H. Auden
item.description: "May it not be that, just as we have to have faith in Him, God has to have faith in us and, considering the history of the human race so far, may it not be that ''faith'' is even more difficult for Him than it is for us?" -- W.H. Auden

item.title: EJ add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
EJ add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: EJ add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "It's like Tolstoy said. Happiness is an allegory, unhappiness a <i>story</i>." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: EJ add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Listen up - there's no war that will end all wars." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: EJ add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: EJ add a quote by Jonathan Acuff
item.description: "God is an early bird; satan is a night owl. Everyone knows that." -- Jonathan Acuff

item.title: EJ add a quote by Jonathan Acuff
item.description: "That's why I always keep a handful of silver glitter in my pockets. If I get pushed into a conversational corner I throw the glitter into the air, and while the person I'm talking to is distracted, I run away. An additional benefit is that I look like a cool magician, so I've got that going for me." -- Jonathan Acuff

item.title: EJ add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I've learned that you can tell a lot about a person by the way (s)he handles these three things: a rainy day, lost luggage, and tangled Christmas tree lights." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: EJ add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: EJ add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "The desire to reach for the stars is ambitious. The desire to reach hearts is wise." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: EJ add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: EJ add a quote by Henri Matisse
item.description: "Creativity takes courage. " -- Henri Matisse

item.title: EJ add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "The chief enemy of creativity is good sense." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: EJ add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "You can never solve a problem on the level on which it was created." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: EJ add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: EJ add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: EJ add a quote by Stephen Fry
item.description: "Books are no more threatened by Kindle than stairs by elevators." -- Stephen Fry

item.title: EJ add a quote by Stephen Fry
item.description: "You are who you are when nobody's watching." -- Stephen Fry

item.title: EJ add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: EJ add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: EJ add a quote by Margaret Bottome
item.description: "There are seasons when to be still demands immeasurably higher strength than to act." -- Margaret Bottome
